^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BoardID.description: The board ID of the chassis.
BoardID.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a board ID used to identify the chassis.

GUID.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an GUID used to identify the chassis.

BoardSerialNumber.description: The board serial number of the chassis.
BoardSerialNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a board serial number used to identify the chassis.
